content: pocket octopus by erica townsend owner of gracie s petals & bows measures approx 4 long materials hook 4 mm darning needle bernat velvet yarn stuffing safety eyes 6 mm scissors terms chain chain st stitch repeat * slip_stitch slip_stitch single_crochet single_crochet decrease single_crochet two stitches together as one stitch to decrease blo back loop only gauge 4 row x 5 single_crochet = 1 instructions head round 1 chain 2 work 8 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook 8 single_crochet round 2 2 single_crochet in every st around 16sc round 3 *2 single_crochet in next st single_crochet in next st * repeat from * to * around 24 single_crochet rounds 4-7 single_crochet in every st around 24 single_crochet hide beginning tail round 8 *decrease single_crochet * repeat from * to * around 16 single_crochet attach safety eyes between rounds 5 and 6 with 5 sts apart 3 sts showing apart and the eyes going in st 1 and 5 optional take some pink yarn and stitch on some cheeks if you like round 9 decrease around but in blo slip_stitch to 1st st 8 single_crochet stuff fasten_off with long tail and sew hole closed tentacles with the bottom of the head facing upwards attach yarn on one of the front loops that we left in round 9 *single_crochet and chain 8 2 single_crochet 2nd chain from hook and in next 6 chain single_crochet in next front loop we missed * repeat from * to * around slip_stitch to 1st single_crochet to close the round and fasten_off and hide ends hope you enjoyed this pattern if you have any questions about my pattern please contact me at petalsandbows@gmail com you can follow me on facebook at https //www facebook com/petalsandbows copyright 2022 erica townsend this pattern may not be copied sold or given away without the express written permission of the author products made using this pattern are the property of the maker and may be sold traded or given away and are not covered by this copyright
